project.name: presentation
project.description: It is vital that Gentoo-presentations and -folders contain correct information and are updated with the most recent information available. This subproject writes and maintains presentations, folders and other material that users and developers can safely use to promote or demonstrate Gentoo.

longdescription.p: Several users and developers give presentations about Gentoo, either globally or on specific parts (such as Portage, Writing Ebuilds, Writing Documentation, ...). It is therefor vital that these presentations contain correct information and are regularly updated. One of the goals of this subproject is to provide correct presentations about Gentoo.

However, presentations aren't the sole subject of this project. During events people might be interesting in propagating Gentoo folders and flyers. These too should contains correct information and be up to date. We should therefor design professional-looking folders, flyers and posters and make them downloadable to interested users.
